title: News Room – Pulse News
description: A modern news aggregation platform delivering real-time updates across global categories using the News API.

title: Kenya AgriNexus
description: A digital platform spotlighting innovative strategies to revolutionize Kenya’s agricultural sector and boost economic impact.

title: Kenya Motors
description: A modern car rental booking system designed for premium experiences with smooth listings, reservations, and user management.

title: Kenya Railways
description: A digital railway system supporting online ticketing, real-time train management, and commuter convenience.

title: Sanaa Market
description: An e-commerce platform showcasing and selling handcrafted Kenyan goods to a global audience.

title: Luxury Dental
description: A professional dental management platform that simplifies appointments, patient records, and clinic workflows.

title: Marketing System
description: A full-featured marketing and client management system built to streamline campaigns, monitor performance metrics, and manage leads.

title: Advanced Airline Management System
description: A robust airline system to manage flight schedules, reservations, and fleet details from one dashboard.

title: Mentor Match
description: A mentorship matchmaking platform that bridges learners with industry experts through intelligent pairing.

title: CodeInterview
description: A dynamic interview management platform that facilitates real-time technical assessments with live code execution and scoring.

title: Techconnect Kenya
description: A service booking platform connecting customers to certified tech repair providers across Kenya.

title: Grace Church Management
description: A church management platform for handling events, members, sermons, and donation records.

title: Cinzel E-Library
description: A digital library for academic institutions featuring book listings, borrowing logic, and reading progress tracking.
